column4: I havent been entirely fond of the 11.04 upgrade, myself. My flash player is a bit glitchy, but still workable, other than that, I just needed to reset my sound stuff and set classic login again.
heh, I've actually had MUCH better luck with the 11.04 flash
my 10.10 was -perfect- with Flash, for some reason 11.04 messed with that a bit.
I'm using 11.04 with chome + flash, maybe thats the difference
